name: La Sportiva Finale Rock Shoes - Men's
description: Reach the final pitch without wincing when you weight your toes. These all-rounders suit long trad routes or sporty face climbs, and will work indoors or out. They offer good performance and edging ability, and a tensioned heel rand lets you heel and toe hook with no fear of slippage.Uppers are leather microfibre.Slip-lasted construction with 1.1mm P3 (Permanent Power Platform) midsoles.Outsoles are durable, grippy 5mm Vibram® XS Edge.La Sportiva suggests downsizing 1-1.5 sizes (performance fit) or 0.5-1 sizes (comfort fit) from your street shoe size.
